ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to the Directorate of Traditional and Modern Medicine Research, EPHI, for the support in conducting the research smoothly. The authors would like to thank Clinical Microbiology Research Case Team, EPHI, for providing all the clinical isolate microorganisms used in the present study. This study was supported by Ministry of Finance and Economic Development through Ethiopian Public Health Institute [Grant no. 342/02/01/01/008].
